title: How did science and technology evolve during 2.3 million years ago? - Quora

response.answer_text: Alchemy was the beginning of chemistry. The wheel was the beginning of physics. Astrology was the beginning on astronomy. The club and spear was the beginning of warfare. The bully was the beginning of the tribal chief. The chief was the beginning of government. Governments were the beginning of empires. Dreams were the beginning of religions. Religions were the beginning of atheism and sciences. Curiosity was the beginning of everything.
It didn’t evolve much for nearly all of the 2.3 million of years. The Boom started with the steam machine
